resources.string: Mobile phone users often experience unpleasant phone calls,messages or alerts late in the night or in the middle of a meeting which could disturb their sleep or drag their attention away.To circumvent this problem,most of the users turn their phone to silent mode.Nevertheless, some of them forget to switch the phone back to normal mode and tend to miss important calls or messages.
SmartMute has a solution.It helps the users sleep with peace of mind or attend meetings without any interference from the mobile phone by setting the profile to mute for a predefined duration.

Users need to set start mute time and end mute time.During this time period, the profile will be turned to mute.It will automatically switch back to normal mode once the mute period expires.Users will receive notifications when the profile is changed.SmartMute also has an option to repeat the settings throughout the week.
SmartMute uses minimal disk space and battery requirements.There may be a minute delay if the OS is busy.
